channel.title: RayniaWars - New text based MMORPG
channel.description:
Hey all, check out this game I called called RayniaWars. It's similar to DodianWars from dodian.com. Anyway it's loads of fun and free to play completely. Small active community. Anyway try it out, and if you like it, find me in-game and join my alliance!
RayniaWars is a text-based game that challenges you to build an empire from one home-world and a limited amount of resources. Colonize new planets, build an army, forge alliances and conquer the universe!
[url=http://www.rayniawars.com]http://www.rayniawars.com[/url]

item.title: RayniaWars - New text based MMORPG
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Text based games are only good now-a-days for use in learning a language, not like anyone really wants to play them actively…

Read full topic

item.title: RayniaWars - New text based MMORPG
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

Text Based games are pretty stupid. But… I play World at War (text based) when I’m bored.
